abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32614442, pmid32621498, pmid32614178, pmid32609360, pmid32627645, pmid32633840, pmid32628001, pmid32614045, pmid32614040, pmid32621523, pmid32621617, pmid32609741, pmid32628248, pmid32533847, pmid32628673, pmid32614638, pmid32621621
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.08
